segments.text: Okay , Rebecca . Now you ’ Ve given me a good idea of your work and academic background , but what about you as a person ? How would you describe your key strengths ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Mr . Parsons , as I mentioned before I ’ m someone who needs new challenges . I ’ m really focused and hard-working . I think my academic results prove this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , true , but how about other personal qualities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I believe I ’ m a good team-player , but I can also work well independently . I ’ m very enthusiastic and , well I hope my colleagues would agree , I ’ m fun to work with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you say is your most positive quality ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm , that ’ s a tough question . But I would have to say my passion . I ’ m really passionate about journalism and passionate about my career .
segments.speaker: S2
